channel.title: JavaMenu and JMenuItem's
channel.description:
Just working with my first Java menu, was wondering if theres a way to set a width to a JMenuItem. Ive tried to setSize(new dimensions(x,y)) and setPreffered Size, but it doesnt seem to work. The problem is the MenuBar is sizing the menu items so it fills the whole bar.
Has anyone ever hit this problem before or perhaps know of a solution?
Also is there a way to change the width properly for verticle seperators? All I can find on google is to set the width with setpreffered, but its not working....
